property.name: cleanup.policy
property.description: A comma separated list of valid policies for segments beyond the retention window. Valid policies are: "delete" and "compact"

property.name: delete.retention.ms
property.description: The amount of time to retain delete tombstone markers for log compacted topics.

property.name: retention.ms
property.description: This configuration controls the maximum time we will retain a log before we will discard old log segments to free up space if we are using the "delete" retention policy.
